direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve iterating over elements and performing operations on them, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods are related to preparing and handling form data, with similar external behaviors but different functionalities.
Both methods access and manipulate elements within the form, with similar resource access patterns.
Both methods handle exceptions related to element manipulation and data extraction in a similar manner.
Both methods retrieve values from elements, making them substitutable in certain test scenarios.
Both methods depend on the state and attributes of elements, making them dependent on each other in certain contexts.
Both methods involve data manipulation and encoding/decoding, with similar internal structures.
